requirements.description: Both parties must adhere to all relevant privacy laws.
Licensee is responsible for obtaining necessary consents to allow OneSignal to collect information from End Users' devices or browsers.
Licensee must publish privacy policies and disclosures for the Properties that are in compliance with applicable laws and the terms of this EULA.
The privacy policies must clearly disclose the collection of SDK Information and its intended use, as detailed in Section 5 of the EULA.

type.summary: Disclosure of Data Collection and Use
